targets.query: from(bucket: "processo") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "s7_db1") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "contador_bom") |> last()

from(bucket: "processo") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "s7_db1") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "contador_bom") |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false) |> last()

from(bucket: "processo") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "s7_db1") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "contador_ruim") |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false) |> last()

from(bucket: "processo") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "s7_db1") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "contador_bom") |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false) |> derivative(unit: 1m, nonNegative: true)
